sentences.sentence: My father will sing ditties when he is happy.
sentences.translation: 父亲高兴的时候会唱一些小调。

sentences.sentence: She bawled her senseless ditties to the audience.
sentences.translation: 她声嘶力竭对听众唱出她那无意义的小曲。

sentences.sentence: Hopefully, his hard work transcends the realm of short-lived disposable ditties.
sentences.translation: 他希望，自己的努力能超越那些昙花一谢的歌曲范畴。
